productAttributes.title: Micromax Q55 Bling Limited IIFA Edition Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The IIFA Edition of Q55 Bling which was till now reserved for your favorite bollywood stars can now be possessed by you. Micromax Q55 Bling is a QWERTY mobile with a Swarovski studded chassis targeted at the chic fashinoista. Micromax Q55 Bling sports a spaced out backlit QWERTY keypad by flipping the phone open.

Micromax Q55 Bling comes with 19.9 MB internal memory of which is expandable up to 8 GB with a microSD card. Micromax Q55 Bling sports a 2 megapixel camera which can take good quality pictures,but you will have to slide out the QWERTY keypad everytime you are capturing an image.

Micromax Bling Q55 features a high quality music player, powered by YAMAHA. Micromax Q55 Bling also supports one touch access to Facebook and numerous IM's like Gtalk,Y!M and AOL as well as a multiformat music player, background music playback and more.

Micromax Q55 Bling can store 1000 phone book entries in the phone book and 1000 SMS in internal memory. This phone from Micromax also offers several connectivity offers like EDGE, WAP, GPRS and Bluetooth A2DP. This phone comes preloaded with Opera Mini. The Micromax Q55 Bling is powered by a 850 mAh Li-ion battery which offers up to 4 hrs of talktime and up to 168 hrs of talk time. This phone also comes with the Flight Mode feature, which lets you access the multimedia features in the phone without having it emit any RF signal. Micromax Q55 Bling also comes with a FM radio receiver.

productAttributes.title: Samsung Galaxy5 I5503 Black, with 2 GB Micro SD Card
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Galaxy 5 measures a petite 108 x 56 x 12.3 millimeters, and yet packs an impressive feature set. It's one of the cheapest Android 2.1 device in the market and comes with a 600 MHz processor, 2.8-inch QVGA touchscreen, 2 megapixel camera, microUSB port, microSD card slot that supports up to 16 GB and 3.5mm audio jack. Galaxy 5 has also has all bases covered when it comes to connectivity options, it has Wi-Fi with DLNA, 3G HSDPA, GPS with A-GPS and Bluetooth.

The phone supports SNS integrated phonebook and calendar, this gives instant accessibility to your contact's mails, texts, tweets & status updates. It also features full integration of Google services, Outlook & Facebook Calendar. It comes with 'Swype Type' feature, it lets you construct words with a continuous swipe connecting the required alphabets. Once gotten the hang of, it lets you type much faster than you ever could on a mobile keypad. The app intuitively adds you phonebook contacts into its dictionary. The handset comes preloaded with Write and Go app which lets you write/ paste text and send/post it instantly via/on SMS,SNS MMS, email, memo or the calendar.

The Galaxy5 comes with the intuitive Touchwiz 3.0 interface from Samsung that supports powerful multitasking features. It combines 7 customisable homescreens, directional swipes and advanced interactive widgets to render a seamless mobile experience.

The phone sports a 2 MP fixed focus camera, that takes passable pictures and supports an array of scene modes and white balance options. The music player supports MP3, ACC, ACC+, Eacc+, WMA formats and you can plug in any generic headphones to the 3.5 mm jack.

The handset offers extensive GPS functionalities. It supports Layar Reality Browser which displays real 3D views of a location and digs up information with clickable icons on the screen. The Global core POI information powered by Google Maps helps you locate nearby restaurants, movie theaters etc. The Galaxy 5 supports Real-time route calculation which plots out the fastest route to your destination.

The Galaxy 5 comes with AllShare DLNA feature, that lets users share media files among their PC, TV and mobile. The handset also doubles up as a remote controller for the DLNA network. The handset packs a 1200 mAh battery that supports an impressive 8.5 hrs of talktime and 520 hrs of standby.

productAttributes.title: Micromax Q75 Charcoal Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Micromax Q75 is a uniquely designed phone which allows you to stay connected with your friends and business associates. The Dual SIM GSM + GSM handset separates your personal and professional life. The well-spaced QWERTY keypad on the Q75, allows texting with ease. The bar phone comes with a trackball which allows smooth navigation through all your applications.

The Micromax Q75 has a 2.4-inch QVGA TFT display which lets you view images with a resolution of 240 x 320 pixels. The sturdy phone sports a 3.2 megapixel camera that never lets you miss special moments in life. You can also record videos and play them in 3GP, AVI and MP4 formats.

Battery and Storage

A 1200 mAh battery powers the Micromax Q75 handset, which gives you a talk time of up to 7 hours. When fully charged, the phone supports a standby time up to 240 hours. The Q75 allows you to store files as the memory can be expanded up to 8 GB using microSD or microSDHC cards. You can store up to 1000 contacts in the phonebook and 1000 SMSes in the inbox of this handset.

Multimedia

The bar phone is loaded with a music player that stores and plays songs of your choice. The player is equipped to support multi format files such as MP3, AMR, MIDI and WAV. When you are bored with the music in your library, you can tune in to the Stereo FM radio and listen to live music playing on the air waves. The 3.5 mm audio jack in the phone lets you use any generic headphone on the handset.

Connectivity and Features

Micromax Q75 allows you to stay connected with your friends through GPRS, EDGE and Wi-Fi platforms supported on the handset. The Opera Mini browser lets you browse various web pages and check emails on the go. You can share videos, images and music tracks with other devices through Bluetooth and USB connectivity options.

The Zenga mail feature in this QWERTY handset lets you access multiple mail accounts through one application. With the Snaptu, you can stay connected with your friends on Facebook and Twitter. The instant messaging facility, Nimbuzz, enabled on the bar phone lets you chat with friends. The Micromax also comes with embedded Java applications which keep the user engaged.

productAttributes.title: Micromax Q3+ Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Micromax Q3+ is a Dual SIM mobile phone that comes with a QWERTY keypad. The phone supports 2G network in frequency band of 900 and 1800 MHz. A 1.3 megapixel camera is also packed into the device.

This Micromax QWERTY mobile comes preloaded with Nimbuzz, the multi instant messenger IM application. This software lets users of the Micromax device chat with their friends irrespective of any IM services used. The Micromax Q3+ has Facebook ready feature, which takes you to the Facebook homepage with just the touch of one button.

The bar styled handset from Micromax features a 2.19-inch TFT display screen with 262 K color support and 176 x 220 pixel resolution. The Q3+ weighs 97 g and has dimensions of 111.2 x 61.2 x 13 mm. The full QWERTY keypad features a 5-way trackball that helps in easy navigation.

Battery and Storage

The battery used in this Micromax handset is a standard Li-Ion 1000 mAh battery, which serves a talk time of 4 hours and standby time of 160 hours. The on-board memory of the mobile phone is 10 MB. External memory up to 2 GB can be added using a microSD card. The phone book of the Micromax Q3+ can store up to 1000 contacts and an equal number of SMSes can be saved.

Multimedia

This QWERTY device packs in various multimedia features. The Micromax Q3+ comes with Stereo FM Radio with recording feature, Music Player and preloaded Games. There is also option of running the phone music player in flight mode. The audio formats supported include mp3, amr, midi and wav. The Micromax Q3+ gives you the option of making conference calls, assigning contacts to speed dial and talking over the speaker or using handsfree set.

Connectivity and Features

Users can access Internet on the Micromax Q3+ through GPRS. Browsing content on the Internet is made possible through the WAP browser. You can use Bluetooth service incorporated into the phone to exchange files with other devices. Additional features of this Dual SIM phone include voice memo and predictive text input.

productAttributes.title: Samsung I5801 White, with 2 GB Micro SD Card
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung I5801 is an entry-level Android device running the Android 2.1 Eclair OS. The Galaxy 3 sports a Corby inspired chassis, and has a 3.2-inch WQVGA capacitive touch screen. The handset is powered by a Qualcomm 667 MHz processor, and runs Samsung's TouchWiz 3.0 UI. The TouchWiz skinning brings in several nifty features like scrollable widgets, Swype support and an app drawer. The 3 megapixel camera on the Galaxy 3 I5801 offers a range of preset scene modes, and can record videos in 240 x 320 resolution at 15 fps.

Design

The Samsung I5801 sports a candybar form factor and measures 113.5 x 55 x 12.55 mm and weighs 113 g. The I5801 features a sleek, mirror finish front and black matte rear panel. Beneath the display is the triangular home button which is flanked by the touch-sensitive Menu and Back Android buttons. The top of the handset houses the dust-protected micro-USB port, a 3.5 mm headphone jack, and the power button that also doubles as a lock switch.

Battery and Storage

The Galaxy I5801 is powered by a high capacity 1500 mAh battery, which is rated for 7 hrs of talk time and 21 days of standby on 3G networks. The phone has 130 MB of internal memory and supports up to 32 GB microSD cards.

Connectivity and Features

The Samsung Galaxy 3 I5801 can connect to the web via 3G and Wi-Fi networks and is preloaded with WebKit-based browser. The I5801 supports Kinetic scrolling and smooth zooms for an enhanced web navigation experience. The 3G mobile lets you initiate Facebook/Twitter/MySpace and Gtalk/Yahoo! Messenger/MSN services with just a single swipe. Furthermore, the Galaxy 3's contact book is seamlessly integrated with your SNS, IM, email, and calendar. The Samsung I5801 has a built-in GPS receiver and supports Layar Reality Browser which displays real view of a location along with clickable information icons.

The Galaxy 3 supports the unique 'Swype function', which lets you type much faster compared to conventional input methods. The app can also intuitively add your phonebook contacts into its dictionary. The Write and Go support on the Samsung Galaxy 3 allows you to write/copy/paste text and send it via SMS, MMS or Email. Samsung has ported the impressive music player from the Galaxy S onto the Galaxy I5801, along with the 5.1 channel surround support in headset mode. Despite it's budget price range, Galaxy 3 is loaded with a capacitive touchscreen, impressive social networking integration and a zippy processor, which renders it as a classic case of bang for your buck.

productAttributes.title: Nokia E5 Carbon Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nokia E5 is a mid-range smartphone sporting a full QWERTY keyboard with a 2.4-inch display at 320 x 240 pixels and 256K color. The E5 borrows quite a lot from the much acclaimed and higher priced E72 and almost manages to match its impressive business feature-set. The Nokia E5 runs Symbian OS v. 9.3 and is powered by an ARM 11 600 MHz processor and supports faster multitasking.

The E5 sports a 5 megapixel camera with LED Flash and captures images at 2592 x 1944 pixel resolution.The mobile can also record DVD quality video at 15 fps. The impressive social network integration on the Nokia E5 allows you to upload snaps and videos in a matter of minutes.

Design

The Nokia E5 features a typical QWERTY candy-bar chassis that measures 115 x 58.9 x 12.8 mm and weighs 126 g. The E5 sports a well-spaced, tactile keyboard with fair amount of travel and feedback. Nokia has added a neat set of shortcuts for the E5 including one for turning Bluetooth on and off, which will please those who like to have an earpiece in for phone calls. Another useful shortcut is the space bar, press and hold it to turn the camera flash on or off.

Battery and Storage

The Nokia E5 comes with 256 MB of onboard memory and recognizes upto 32 GB microSD cards. The mobile is powered by a 1200 mAh Li-Ion battery that is rated for 13 hrs of talk time on 2G network and 5 hours of talk time on 3G network and 635 hrs of standby time on 2G network and 670 hours on 3G network.

Connectivity and Features

The E5 is built for high-speed web connectivity and comes with 3GHSDPA and Wi-Fi connectivity. The mobile works seamlessly with your computer to sync your documents, photos and calendar. The Nokia E5 supports Mail for Exchange and IBM Lotus Notes Traveler for faster Push Mail notifications. You can also view/edit Documents on the go with the Quickoffice application. The mobile supports A-GPS and is preloaded with Ovi Maps, Nokia's free navigation solution which offers free life-time Walk and Drive Navigation support.

The mobile's browser is based on the same WebKit rendering engine as Google's Android Browser and delivers a user-friendly web navigation experience. The Nokia E5 supports access to Facebook, Twitter and Orkut. Keyboard shortcuts and the D-Pad lets you zoom in and out of individual web pages and get a quick overview of a page. The Nokia E5 lets you access up to 10 personal email accounts including Hotmail, Gmail and Yahoo! Mail and supports Windows Live, Yahoo!, Google Talk and Ovi Chat IMs.

The E5 has a single home screen which can be configured with different sets of apps, shortcuts and widgets. The device supports a range of personalization options, you can configure the homescreen to provide access to the Wi-Fi sniffer and email notifications when you're working, and make it show Facebook and Twitter updates when you are away from office. The Nokia E5 is one of those rare handsets that manages to juggle the balance between business and leisure and does a fine job at that.
productAttributes.sizeVariants: MOBCR9NHTEUCKUXD, MOBCR9NSBBHPZG75, MOBCR9NSGXYR7HSB, MOBD2KCWSYFM56GF, MOBD2KCWX6QZ6UGH, MOBD2KE62GXCFVX2, MOBD2KE62VZ82ZJP

productAttributes.title: Samsung mPower TV S239 Metallic Silver
productAttributes.productDescription:
The stylish looking Samsung mPower TV S239 has been engineered to incorporate some of the most sought after features. This bar-shaped mobile phone sports an alphanumeric keypad for ease of interaction. The mPower TV S239 runs BREW 3.1 operating system to deliver rich and intuitive user experience. This Samsung mobile phone reproduces graphics and images on a 2.4 inch TFT LCD display. This screen supports QVGA resolution of 240 x 320 pixels. You will notice that the colours gain life-like vibrancy as the screen can identify 256 K unique colour combinations.

This mobile comes embedded with a 1.3 megapixel camera to help you click impressive visuals of the most cherished moments of your life. This camera lets you add dynamism to the photos with features like single shot, multi-shot mode, mosaic shot, photo effects and white balance. Additionally, this mobile camera helps you to record videos of the most memorable events. The compact and lightweight Samsung mPower has been devised for use on CDMA network. This mobile phone comfortably fits in your hand with the dimensions of 50 x 118.5 x 12.4 mm and it weighs 87 g.

Battery and Storage

This mobile phone is powered by 960 mAh Li-Ion battery that promises to fuel 4 hours of talk time and 420 hours of standby time, both on 2G network. This mobile phone has been loaded with 85 MB of internal memory to house all your important files on the phone memory itself. However, if you are not able to accommodate any file on the phone memory then you can expand the memory of this device up to 16 GB with a microSD card. This mobile can host 2000 contacts in phonebook memory thus giving you the freedom to organize your contacts in a better way. This mobile phone can store 1000 text messages. So, you don’t need to bother about deleting old messages to receive the new ones.

Multimedia

The Samsung mobile phone has been equipped with a lot of multimedia features to take care of your entertainment-related needs. This phone features a music player that supports multiple formats. Also, there is a video player that is ready to play various formats. However, if you are fond of listening to radio shows then you can use the in-built FM Radio on this phone. Additionally, this phone supports FM recording to help you record your favourite show on the radio and listen to it at a later point of time.

Connectivity and Features

You will find that Samsung mPower TV S239 has integrated some of the connectivity features that you would like have in your handset. This Samsung phone supports 3G to help you surf faster Internet on your handheld device even while you are on-the-move. For a simplified and comfortable browsing experience, this phone has been loaded with Polaris 6.15 preinstalled browser. This Samsung phone supports video streaming thus you can enjoy live TV on your handset even while you are travelling. This phone has been loaded with both Bluetooth and USB to help you exchange files and documents with other devices in your vicinity. You can opt to share multimedia messages with other friends across the distance with the help of MMS support. This mobile phone features a mobile tracker that helps you trace your handset in case of theft.

productAttributes.title: Micromax Q50 Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Micromax Q50 is a Dual SIM GSM+GSM phone with a QWERTY keypad. The Q50 is a social media focused mobile and comes preloaded with multiple social networking apps. This QWERTY phone comes preloaded with Facebook widget and features the Instant Messaging service, Nimbuzz. The social network integrator, Snaptu offers mobile optimised versions of multiple social networking sites.

The mobile sports a 2.2 inch QVGA display with 320 x 240 pixel resolution. The phone has a 2 megapixel rear-facing camera with built-in photo editing software. The Q50 is a 2G phone and supports dual band 900/1800Mhz networks.

Multimedia

The Micromax Ezpad features SRS Surround Sound enhancement that delivers hi-fidelity acoustic output. The Q50 media player supports 3GP and MP4 video formats. Also included is an FM Radio capable of live-recording and support for Java based games.

Storage and Battery

A 1000 mAh Lithium-Ion battery powers the Micromax Q50, giving 3 hrs of talk time and 192 hours of standby time. This QWERTY mobile can store up to 1000 phone book contacts and an equal number of text messages. The Q50 comes with a microSD slot that accepts up to 16 GB cards.

Connectivity and Features

The Q50 Ezpad supports GPRS, EDGE connectivity and comes preloaded with Opera Mini browser. Other connectivity options in the Q50 include Bluetooth, micro USB port and 3.5 mm audio port. The Q50 supports Java apps and features one touch access to Java store for easy downloads.

productAttributes.title: Samsung Wave S5253 Metallic Black, with 2 GB Memory Card
LG Cookie Snap GM360i with 2 GB Memory Card
productAttributes.productDescription:
The LG Snap features a 3 inch 240 ?? 400 pixel touchscreen and runs on LG's S Class interface. It offers full-fledged social networking access and enhanced multimedia experience. The GM360i features a 5 megapixel camera with Schneider-Kreuznach lens with LED Flash.

The Cookie Snap supports full-fledged Social Network via dedicated widgets on the homescreen, there is also Push Email support and a new ???Optic-All Zoom??? feature which lets you zoom in without comprising on the image quality. The LG Snap supports MP3, WMA & eAAC + audio formats and comes with a preset equalizer for enhanced sound output. It also supports MPEG4, H264, H263 & WMV video formats. The mobile supports Wi-Fi connectivity and instantly recognizes and tethers to a network once in a Wi-Fi enabled zone.

The GM360i comes preloaded with NDTV Active, Document Viewer, Newshunt, & LG Game Portal. It offers instant access to Orkut, Facebook, Picasa & Myspace feedsdirectly on the homescreen. Another neat feature on the handset is the Editable Screen shot MMS which lets you doodle on any normal snapshot and send it as a MMS. The handset comes with 32MB of memory and supports up to 16GB expandable memory. The handset is powered by a 900 mAh LI-Ion battery and is rated for 8hrs 15 mts of talktime.

productAttributes.title: Micromax Q66 Piano Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Micromax Q66 Eclipse is a social networking slider phone which helps you keep in touch with your friends. The Swivel form factor phone comes with well-spaced QWERTY keypad which allows texting with ease. The Dual SIM GSM + GSM phone gives you the advantage of two network connections in one handset. The trackpad on the phone allows smooth navigation through all your applications.

The phone features a 2.4-inch TFT colour screen with a resolution of 320 x 240 pixels, thus enhancing the visual experience of the user. This 2G network phone can easily slide in to your pocket as it measures 71 x 71 x 18 mm in dimensions and weighs only 118 g.

The phone features a 2 megapixel camera which helps you capture and share your memories with friends. You can also record videos and play them in H.263 formats on the Micromax Q66. The camera supports features like white balance and scene mode which enhance your photography experience.

Battery and Storage

The Dual SIM phone from Micromax is powered by Li-Ion 850 mAh battery. When fully charged, the battery gives you a talk time up to 4 hours and a standby time of up to 192 hours. You can store 1000 contacts in the phone memory of Micromax Q66. This phone stores videos, images and music tracks up to 8 GB using microSD or microSDHC cards.

Multimedia

The Micromax Q66 is loaded with a music player which supports MP3 formats. The stereo FM radio allows you to tune in to your favourite FM channels and enjoy listening to music on the go. This phone supports MP3 and other popular music formats. The embedded SRS WOW HD feature enhances the sound quality by producing 3D sound effects. You can also keep yourself engaged by playing games on the phone while commuting long distances.

Connectivity and Features

The Eclipse allows you to access the Internet through GPRS and EDGE platforms. The preloaded Opera Mini browser lets you browse various web pages on the go. The phone also has a USB port and also supports the Bluetooth feature that helps you share files with other devices. The handset is preloaded Snaptu application helps you access social networking sites like Facebook and Twitter that help you get connected with your friends at all times. You can also chat with your friends 24x7 through the instant messaging facility like Nimbuzz.

productAttributes.title: Samsung I5503 Chic White, with 2 GB Micro SD Card
Samsung Ch@t 369 Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung Ch@t 369 is a CDMA phone that features the high speed 3G broadband technology, EVDO. The CDMA handset features a 2.2 inch QVGA display with 320 x 240 pixels. The Samsung 369 sports a candybar form factor with a permanent landscape orientation. The handset is built on the OMH platform which gives you the freedom to choose any CDMA service provider.

The 2 megapixel camera on the Samsung 369 supports digital zoom and multiple shoot modes for varying light conditions. Weighing 102.3 g, the Samsung CDMA handset integrates a full QWERTY keyboard for faster texting and seamless web browsing.

Multimedia
The Samsung Ch@t 369 comes with a music player that plays your favorite music in popular formats. The 3.5 mm port can connect to any stereo headset. The built-in FM radio in the Samsung Ch@t can record on-air songs in MP3 format. The phone supports Java platform applications and enables you to download games and other multimedia apps.

Battery and Storage
This Samsung CDMA phone is powered by a 1000 mAh battery and gives a talk time of up to 4 hours. The Lithium-Ion cell can go on standby mode for up to 420 hours. The 104 MB of internal memory in the Samsung Ch@t 369 can be expanded up to 16 GB with microSD card. The phone can store up to 2000 phonebook entries in the contact book.

Connectivity and Features
The EVDO 3G connectivity in the Samsung Ch@t 369 supports fast web browsing capabilities. You can also connect the phone to a laptop and use it as a modem. Data transfer options in the Samsung handset is enabled through a USB port and Bluetooth connectivity. The phone is preloaded with an intuitive email client that supports instant mail notifications for up to 4 different login IDs.

The Advanced Mobile Tracker feature allows you to remotely wipe data from the 369 in the event of a loss/theft. The Palringo Instant Messenger in the Samsung M369 integrates multiple chat clients like Gtalk, Yahoo! Messenger and MSN into a single interface. Other features in the Samsung Ch@t 369 include SOS messaging, Live TV, Mobile Prayers and Indian Calendar.

productAttributes.title: Alcatel ICE OT606 Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Alcatel ICE OT606 is a small phone that is packed with features that will take you by surprise. This seemingly simple 2G network supported phone with an alphanumeric keypad slides open to a QWERTY keypad that makes texting convenient and fun. This GSM phone from Alcatel has a 2.2-inch TFT QVGA screen with a resolution of 320 x 240 pixels, to give you a comfortable visual experience while handling the phone.

The phone is loaded with a 0.3 megapixel camera that lets you take pictures on the go. You can also record videos effectively with the Alcatel OT606. The phone measures 51 x 109 x 16.5 mm and weighs only 109.2 g, making it a convenient device to carry.

Battery and Storage

This Alcatel ICE phone is a winner when it comes to its battery backup. The phone is powered by a Li-Ion 670 mAh battery which delivers a talk time of up to 11 hours and a standby time of up to 530 hours. The internal memory of 4 MB on this phone is expandable up to 8 GB using microSD, microSDHC cards. The Alcatel ICE OT606 is capable of storing up to 600 SMSes and contacts on it.

Multimedia

This slider phone from Alcatel is a capable entertainer when it comes to meeting your multimedia needs. The phone has an audio player that supports MP3 and eAAC+ formats. The Alcatel ICE phone has a video player that supports MP4, H.263 and H.264 formats and keeps you entertained at all times. An integrated FM radio allows you to tune in to radio stations of your choice effortlessly. You can also listen to music by connecting headphones to the 3.5 mm audio jack on the handset.

Connectivity and Features

You can connect to the Internet through a GPRS platform supported on the Alcatel ICE OT606. The preinstalled Opera Mini browser on the phone lets you browse the pages of the web effortlessly. The phone lets you access your Email and keep in touch with professional and personal contact circles with ease. You can also access Google Mail, Windows Live, Yahoo and AOL, and stay constantly connected.

The Alcatel ICE is a JAVA enabled handset and you can access these applications to meet your varied needs. Bluetooth and a micro USB port on the phone let you connect and share files with other compatible devices. This mobile phone supports the Parlingo Multi IM client that supports popular IM portals and keeps you connected with friends at all times.

productAttributes.title: Samsung Omnia 652 B6520 Deep Black, with 1GB
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung Omnia 652 is a QWERTY Windows smartphonefeaturing a 2.4-inch TFT QVGA display. The Omnia 652 runs Windows Mobile 6.5. The Windows mobile platform brings in some useful business suite inclusions like the Microsoft Outlook Mobile and Pocket Office Editor Word, Excel , Powerpoint and PDF viewer.

The 2 megapixel camera on the Samsung Omnia 652 supports 2x zoom and can record videos in QVGA resolution at 15 fps. The mobile comes with a front facing secondary camera.

Design

The streamlined chassis coupled with the rounded edges allows for an ergonomic grip on the phone. The Samsung mobile sports a full QWERTY keypad with useful shortcuts for mail, messaging and browser.

Battery and Storage

The Samsung Omnia B6520 is powered by a 1500 mAh battery and supports 12 hrs of 2G and 7 hrs of 3G talk time respectively. The internal memory of 200 MB on the B6520 can be expanded up to 16 GB via microSD card slot.

Connectivity and Features

The Samsung Omnia supports web browsing via 3G, Wi-Fi and GPRS connectivity and comes preloaded with Internet Explorer 6.0 mobile browser. File transfer on the Samsung 652 is facilitated through Bluetooth connectivity and micro USB port. Equipped with A-GPS connectivity, the Omnia features fast navigation capabilities using online applications.

The Omnia 652 is equipped with Samsung's Mobile Tracker a feature that helps you track the phone and retrieve/delete data in the event of theft. The Samsung mobile supports social networking integration with direct access to Facebook, MySpace and Twitter. The Windows OS provides a great platform for unique applications like Direct Printing without a PC. The app allows the Samsung Omnia 652 to connect to a printer via Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, or USB. Other features in the phone include Document Viewer, Voice memo and Instant messenger support.

productAttributes.title: Olive Olive Pad V-T100
productAttributes.productDescription:
Olive Telecom presents users with a 3G Tablet PC that acts as smartphone, an entertainment device, a navigator and lots more. The all-in-one Olive Pad V-T100 is a device that makes the everyday easier and a lot more fun. The Olive Pad V-T100 runs on the Android v2.2 Froyo OS and is powered by the 600 MHz ARM11 Qualcomm processor. The large 7 inch TFT capacitive touchscreen with 800 x 400 pixel resolution gives you crisp and clear display and allows for easy navigation. The V-T100 comes with a 3 megapixel primary camera with 4x zoom and a 0.3 megapixel VGA secondary camera. You can enjoy taking pictures any time, any where.

Design

The 3G V-T100 measures 110 x 179.4 x 11.5 mm in dimension and for a multi-function tablet PC this is just about the right size. The tablet's smooth look and finish is simply alluring. The tablet neatly packs an inbuilt microphone, speakers and a 3.5 mm audio jack. The V-T100 tablet is equipped with G-Sensor, E-Compass Sensor and Ambient Light Sensor and together they make toggling between applications easy. You get the best view pertaining to the application in use.

Storage and Battery

The V-T100 has an inbuilt memory of 512 MB and a 16 GB internal memory card. The memory can be expanded up to 32 GB using micro SD or micro SDHC cards. You can store up to 500 messages on the V-T100’s SMS memory and up to 2000 contacts on the phonebook memory. Powered by a 3240 mAh Li-Po battery the tablet supports up to 26 hours of talktime on the 2G network and up to 9 hours on the 3G network. The tablet delivers up to 600 hours standby time on 2G and 3G.

Connectivity and Features

You can browse, send and receive Email and stay updated because the Android V-T100 is equipped with GPRS, 3G and Wi-Fi. The V-T100 makes an ideal travel buddy because this A-GPS tablet comes with Google Maps that allows you to find your way in an unknown city. The tablet has a mini USB port that allows you to connect the tablet with your PC. But for wireless transfer of files you can simply use the Bluetooth feature.

The V-T100 Olive Pad comes with preloaded applications such as G-mail, G-Talk and Google Docs and also has features like Document Viewer, Document Editor, Pushmail and Ebook Reader to help you get work done even on the go. For your entertainment the tablet comes with a music player and video player. The Olive Olive Pad V-T100 is a fast, smart and handy Android tablet that gives you anything you need in a single touch.

productAttributes.title: Samsung DUOS W169 Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
Samsung DUOS W169 is a mid-level phone with Dual Active SIM capability GSM and CDMA. This gives the convenience of using a CDMA and a GSM connection in active modes to enhance connectivity and services value, making it a good value preposition.The GSM operates on 900/1800 Mhz bands while the CDMA operates on the CDMA 800 Mhz.

DUOS W169's bar design features improved visuals on the 2.2 inch TFT LCD screen. With a screen resolution of 176 x 220 pixels, the Samsung DUOS has video recording. CIF formats, which are mainly used to achieve quality in teleconferencing environments, provides enhanced viewing experience for videos.

Apart from multimedia tools like MP3 Player, and recording from the VGA Camera, the DUOS W169 has Stereo FM with recording in MP3 formats to the MicroSD card. The camera in DUOS W169 supports 12x Zoom, multi shoot modes like Single Shot, Continuous Shot, Mosaic Shot, and Frame Shot. Other features of the camera include Wite balance adjustability and Photo Effects like Black and White, Sephia, or sketch. Transfer of music, video and data is convenient and wireless using Bluetooth v2.1 and USB connectivity. Running Java Applications is possible since the DUOS W169 has Java support.

The DUOS W169 uses a 1000 mAh battery providing up to 4 hrs of talktime and 250 hrs of standby time. The power supply to the multimedia applications like camera, MP3 player, and Stereo FM radio is adequate. Store all your videos and music, with all those pictures on the phone's internal 42 MB space or microSD card expandable to 8GB.

productAttributes.title: iBall Thin Black, with 2 GB Memory Card
productAttributes.productDescription:
The iBall Thin is a sleek phone that is designed to meet your personal and professional needs. This QWERTY phone measures only 8 mm in thickness, making this mobile phone easy to carry and pocket. A 2.2-inch wide screen display makes your images look strikingly clear. The iBall Thin is a Dual SIM GSM + GSM device with a Dual Standby feature. This handset is preloaded with a WAP browser and supports social networking applications like Facebook and Twitter.

This QWERTY phone is loaded with a 1.3 megapixel camera with a flash and digital zoom. A multi-shot feature enables you to click a burst of images. A secondary camera located in the front of this mobile phone can be used to take self-portraits. You can also record videos with the iBall Thin handset.

Battery and Storage

A 600 mAh dual battery powers this iBall phone that gives you a talk time of up to 7 hours and a standby time of up to 288 hours. This mobile phone comes with another battery of 850 mAh capacity to provide back up in case the first battery drains out. You can store up to 200 text messages and 500 phonebook contacts on this mobile. The memory of the iBall Thin is expandable up to 8 GB using microSD, microSDHC cards.

Multimedia

This mobile phone has a capable music player that stores and plays music on demand in MP3 formats. The iBall Thin has a video player that allows you to watch all your favorite videos in 3GP formats. An integrated FM radio with recording option lets you tune in to your favorite radio stations even on the go. A shake sensor installed on this iBall phone allows you to change songs by shaking your mobile, making your music experience convenient and fun.

Connectivity and Features

A GPRS platform supported on this phone lets you connect to the Internet. This QWERTY phone is enabled with a Bluetooth device and has a USB port with which you can connect to other devices and share files. A Mobile Tracker feature helps you trace your phone even if the handset gets misplaced. The phone is also enabled with a password lock that secures phonebook contacts, messages and other features.

The iBall Thin is a JAVA enabled phone and supports games. An Ebook reader is preloaded on this mobile phone and is a handy feature to carry with you. The iBall Thin supports multi party conference calling with which you can talk to more than one person at a time.

productAttributes.title: iBall Glider Touch Black Gold, with 2 GB Memory Card
productAttributes.productDescription:
The iBall Glider is a trendy looking slide phone that features an alphanumeric keypad beneath the screen. The Glider uses 2.6 inch TFT display supporting a maximum resolution of 240 x 400 pixels to create clear and sharp visuals. This mobile helps you to glide through social networking sites with apps dedicated to instant messaging, Yahoo, Nimbuzz, Facebook and Twitter. The dual SIM iBall mobile is meant for 2G network.

The iBall Glider sports a 3 megapixel camera to that supports multi-shot mode. The iBall mobile offers you multi-shot mode to catch impressive photos that you can always cherish as a memory. This mobile comes loaded with E-book reader letting you read books and magazines right on your phone.

Battery and Storage

The iBall Glider uses 850 mAh battery to deliver a talk time of up to 4 hours and a standby time of up to 170 hours. The iBall mobile comes with an internal memory of 25 MB to store all apps and other important files on the phone. However, the memory is expandable up to 16 GB to house all your files that exceed the Glider?'s internal memory. These files may be your favourite audio, video files and also the photos and videos that you shoot. This phone can hold 1000 contacts in phonebook and up to 1000 text messages in your inbox thus giving you the freedom to stay organized.

Multimedia

The iBall Glider is equipped with a music player that plays MP3 and WAV audio formats and you can watch MP3, 3GP and AVI format videos with its video player. This phone allows you to access all the multimedia files with a dedicated multimedia key. The Glider comes to you with pre-installed games thus letting you enjoy your leisure time. This phone features FM Radio with recording thus allowing you to listen and record your favourite show on the radio.

Connectivity and Features

You can browse the Internet on your phone with the GPRS enabled iBall Glider. To keep you at ease and to offer you a better browsing experience this phone comes equipped with Opera mini web browser. The iBall mobile helps you exchange files with the help of Bluetooth and USB port. This Glider features a backlit keypad that helps you interact with the device even in the darkness.

productAttributes.title: iBall Shaan S-306 Black Blue
productAttributes.productDescription:
The iBall Shaan S306 is a neatly built phone. This device has a very sturdy design and is packed with features that meet your needs. A 1.8-inch TFT screen with a resolution of 128 x 160 pixels forms the display of the phone. The iBall S306 is a Dual SIM GSM + GSM with a Dual Standby feature that allows you to separate your personal and professional life. This iBall phone is preloaded with a WAP browser through which you can access the Internet. You can also take pictures and record videos with the iBall S306.

Battery and Storage

A 850 mAh battery powers this iBall phone that gives you a talk time of up to 5 hours and a standby time of up to 216 hours. The phone memory on this mobile is capable of storing 200 SMSes and 1000 phonebook contacts. The memory on this mobile is expandable up to 4 GB using microSD, microSDHC cards.

Multimedia

The music player with dedicated music keys stores and plays all your favorite music in MP3 formats. The iBall S306 also has a video player that supports 3GP formats and keeps you entertained. This mobile phone has an integrated FM radio with recording that lets you tune in to radio stations of your choice even on the go. You can also listen to the radio through the loudspeaker loaded on the phone. The iBall S306 ha a 3.5 mm audio jack to connect headphones and listen to audio of high quality.

Connectivity and Features

You can connect to the Internet through a GPRS platform supported on this phone. You can access Emails on the iBall S306. Bluetooth and a micro USB port on this phone lets you connect and share files with other devices. This iBall phone is enabled with a mobile tracker that you can use to trace your phone in case it gets misplaced.

A password lock feature helps you lock your phone, SMS, photos and phonebook. The iBall S306 can make conference calls and keep you connected to more than one friend at a time. An Ebook reader is also preloaded on to the iBall S306.

productAttributes.title: iBall Aasaan White
productAttributes.productDescription:
The iBall Aasaan is a GSM handset that is specially designed to serve as an user-friendly communication device for the elderly. Despite the simple aesthetics, Aasaan manages to pack several useful features like SOS messaging, extended battery life and essential utility apps.

The 1.65 inch display on the Aasaan features an extra bright orange back-light for easy readability. The extra-large keypad on the Aasaan takes up much of chassis space and allows for hassle-free typing for those with a failing eyesight. The thoughtful addition of a dedicated flashlight button allows for quick operability in the event of an emergency.

The highlight of the iBall Aasaan is the SOS slider on it's rear panel. Once activated, the phone emits a loud siren to alert anyone nearby. The handset then automatically sends an emergency SMS to 5 pre-defined mobile numbers. After this, the mobile starts calling the 5 numbers in rapid succession until one of them is answered.

Multimedia

The Aasaan comes with an internal FM radio antennae, which allows you to listen to the radio without having to connect the headset. A set of flashing multicolor back-lighting further aids in simplifying operating the phone. There is a 3.5 mm audio out port on the Aasaan for connecting the headset or any generic headphones.

Battery and Storage

A 1000 mAh Lithium Ion battery powers the phone and gives a talktime of 3 hours and 30 minutes. The device can be go on standby for 250 hours. The iBall Aasaan can store up to 200 SMSes and 500 phonebook entries.

Connectivity and Features

The Aasaan features extra loud ringing volume and clearer call reception for easy usability by the target demographic. The phone offers dual language support for menus English and Hindi. Generic utility applications like Alarm, Unit Converter, Scheduler, Clock, Stop Watch and Currency come preloaded in the device.

productAttributes.title: iBall Glider White Gold, with 2 GB Memory Card
productAttributes.productDescription:
The iBall Glider is a stylish elegant Dual SIM GSM+GSM phone packed with smart design and technology. The slider phone features an alphanumeric keypad which lets you experience faster texting. The sleek phone is easy to carry and slides into your pocket easily. With 2.6-inch TFT LCD display you can view images on a wider screen with 240 x 400 pixel resolutions.

The Glider sports a high quality 3.0 megapixel camera with digital zoom and multi-shot mode. This helps you to click good quality images on the move. You can record and play videos in MP4, 3GP and AVI format.

Battery and Storage

Powered by 850 mAh battery, the Glider provides a talk time up to 4 hours and standby time up to 170 hours. The iBall allows you store music, videos and image as the memory can be expanded up to 16 GB using microSD and microSDHC cards. You can store 1000 contacts in the phonebook and SMS in the inbox.

Multimedia

The stylish phone is loaded with a music player which allows you to enjoy your favourite track on your handset. The dedicated music key lets you enjoy music at the press of a button. The player supports music tracks in MP3 and WAV formats.

The pocketable device also gives you an option to tune into your favourite FM stations and get the latest updates on music, news and traffic updates. You can also record your favourite FM shows played directly on the air.

Connectivity and Features

You can access the Internet through the enabled GPRS in iBall Glider. Internet feature like the preinstalled Opera mini browser lets you browse various sites and check emails on the move. The Bluetooth and USB connectivity features helps in sharing files with other devices.

The instant messaging feature like Nimbuzz allows you to stay connected with your friends 24x7 no matter where you are. Those who love reading books can now read it through the E book reader application installed in your handset. You can also use social networking sites like Facebook and Twitter through the Glider.

Additionally, features like call and number blacklist, password lock, background noise change, caller id with photo, alarm, calendar, clock, world time, unit converter, calculator, memo book, to-do list, countdown timer, stop watch and image viewer also meet the communication needs of the people.

productAttributes.title: iBall Thin White, with 2 GB Memory Card
iBall Aasaan Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The iBall Aasaan is a GSM handset that is specially designed to serve as an user-friendly communication device for the elderly. Despite the simple aesthetics, Aasaan manages to pack several useful features like SOS messaging, extended battery life and essential utility apps.

The 1.65 inch display on the Aasaan features an extra bright orange back-light for easy readability. The extra-large keypad on the Aasaan takes up much of chassis space and allows for hassle-free typing for those with a failing eyesight. The thoughtful addition of a dedicated flashlight button allows for quick operability in the event of an emergency.

The highlight of the iBall Aasaan is the SOS slider on its rear panel. Once activated, the phone emits a loud siren to alert anyone nearby. The handset then automatically sends an emergency SMS to 5 pre-defined mobile numbers. After this, the mobile starts calling the 5 numbers in rapid succession until one of them is answered.

Multimedia

The Aasaan comes with an internal FM radio antennae, which allows you to listen to the radio without having to connect the headset. A set of flashing multicolor back-lighting further aids in simplifying operating the phone. There is a 3.5 mm audio out port on the Aasaan for connecting the headset or any generic headphones.

Battery and Storage

A 1000 mAh Lithium Ion battery powers the phone and gives a talktime of 3 hours. The device can be go on standby for 250 hours. The iBall Aasaan can store up to 200 SMSes and 500 phonebook entries.

Connectivity and Features

The Aasaan features extra loud ringing volume and clearer call reception for easy usability by the target demographic. The phone offers dual language support for menus English and Hindi. Generic utility applications like Alarm, Unit Converter, Scheduler, Clock, Stop Watch and Currency converter come preloaded in the device.

productAttributes.title: Samsung Chat C322 PLUS Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung Chat C322 is a Dual SIM GSM+GSM QWERTY phone featuring a 2.2 inch display. The C322 is the first Dual Standby SIM device from Samsung to sport a QWERTY keypad. The Dual SIM Standby mode allows you to receive calls from both the SIM cards without manual switching.

The Chat C322 features 1.3 megapixel camera with 4X digital zoom. It can also capture videos at 15 fps. The Samsung C322 supports web access via the Access NetFront 3.5 browser and also allows you to access Facebook and Twitter applications. The Multi Instant Messenger app aggregates MSN, Yahoo and Gtalk chat clients.

Battery and Storage

A 1000 mAh battery powers the Samsung Chat C322 and gives 12 hrs of talktime. The 45 MB of internal memory on the phone can be expanded up to 8 GB via microSD card slot. The Samsung Chat can store up to 1000 phonebook contacts and text messages.

Multimedia

The C322 features music player with DNSe 3D sound technology for an enhanced acoustic experience. The FM Radio with recording capability allows you to save on-air songs in MP3 format. The Samsung Chat C322 supports 64 polyphonic ringtones and MP3 format. The device comes with a 3.5 mm audio port that allows you to use any generic headphones. The mobile is preloaded with Java games and animated wallpapers.

Connectivity and Features

Connectivity options on the Samsung Chat C322 include GPRS, EDGE, Bluetooth v2.1 and microUSB port. The phone can connect to a PC for file sharing via the NPS PC Sync Application. The C322 features an Optical Trackpad which allows easier menu navigation. Other features in the Samsung mobile include Mobile Printing, Offline mode, Voice memo and Voice mail.

productAttributes.title: Samsung Wave 575 S5753 Metallic Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung Wave 575 is the predecessor to the Wave 525, the handsets share similar features except for the inclusion of 3G connectivity in the former. It features a 3.2 inch 400 x 240 pixel display, 3 megapixel shooter, GPS and WiFi including 802.11n connectivity.

The Wave 575 features a fully loaded media centre with Sound Alive 3D surround & 3.5mm audio jack for enhanced audio playback. The Music Recognition feature les you identify new songs and purchase them directly to the mobile. It supports the Social Hub app which seamlessly integrates all your phonebook contacts with your SNS, IM, e-mail and calendar accounts, saving you the hassle of having to open up seprate webpages. It even syncs with web calendars and send event invitations to friends instantly.

The mobile features a host of innovate social mapping tools so you can more easily share your location and your life with your buddies. It offers constant Google Latitude and Geo-tagging support and let you stay connected with your friends no matter where you or they are. The Wave 57 supports lightning quick 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi and 3G HSDPA support for uninteruppted connectivity. It also features the lastest Bluetooth 3.0 for enhanced transfer speeds and wireless music streaming and microUSB for on-the-go charging. The mobile sports the Advanced TouchWiz 3.0 UI that makes your mobile experience more intuitive and much simpler. The handset supports up to 10 enhanced homescreens and advanced widgets such as daily briefing and buddies direclty on the homescreen.

The Wave 575 sports a 3.2 MP camera, with multiple scene modes & color correction to futher tweak your images. Samsungs Bada is a truly open source platform and gives you access to a plethora of applications from Samsung App store, the Wave 2 comes with an integrated application store accessibility for downloading games, navigation & social networking tools, e-book, health and lifestyle applications.

productAttributes.title: Micromax Q1+ Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Micromax Q1+ is a Dual SIM GSM+GSM handset featuring a full QWERTY keypad with a 2.2-inch display. The Q1+ can store up to 1000 phonebook entries and 300 text messages. The handset features a menu key and a dedicated messaging key for faster navigation.

Design

The Micromax Q1+ is the predecessor to the Micromax Q1, the upgrade being the addition of a VGA camera. The phone measures 111.2 x 61.2 x 13 mm and weighs 97g.

Storage & Battery

A 1000 mAh Li-ion battery powers the Q1+ and delivers 3 hrs of talktime and 120 hrs of standby time. The Q1+ supports 2 GB microSD cards.

Connectivity & Features

The Q1+ features Stereo FM Radio, an MP3 Player and GPRS connectivity. This Micromax Dual SIM mobile features multiple profile selection, exchange rate converter, memo pad and a unit converter. The multimedia features on the Micromax Q1+ include a multiformat music player & Stereo FM Radio.

productAttributes.title: BlackBerry Curve 8530 Reliance
productAttributes.productDescription:
Research In Motion is expanding its line of BlackBerry Curve phones and the BlackBerry Curve 8530 is one of them. The handset is a CDMA phone with a QWERTY keyboard. This CDMA handset does not have a separate SIM card slot. The small buttons on the keyboard has a fair amount of space between the keys which allows faster typing. The phone is powered by BlackBerry OS 5.0 with a 528 MHz processor which enhances the performance of the phone. The Curve has 2.46-inch TFT LCD screen which deliver pictures at resolution of 320 x 240 pixels.

A 2 megapixel camera with 5x digital zoom and video recording capabilities is sported by Blackberry Curve 8530 smartphone. You can fine tune the photos with the help of white balance and add colour effects. The smartphone also offers Geo-tagging photos. The videos can be recorded at a resolution of 320x240 pixels.

Design

The BlackBerry Curve 8530 has a lightweight and compact design. The handset has a touch-sensitive optical trackpad, which helps the user to navigate features on the mobile. The Curve has a rubber covering on the edge of the phone which creates an easier grip for the user. The keyboard is designed with small plastic keys which makes typing easy. The handset also features dedicated music keys which helps you to change tracks without going to the menu.

Storage and Battery

The Curve 8530 has an internal memory of 256 MB which can be expanded up to 32 GB using microSD, microSDHC cards. The phone is powered by Li-Ion 1150 mAh battery. When fully charged, the Blackberry Curve 8530 gives a talk time up to 4 hours and a standby time up to 252 hours.

Connectivity and Features

The BlackBerry 8530 offers Internet browsing capabilities through 3G and Wi-Fi. You can download email attachments quickly and make use of the Push-mail facility. The phone has a microUSB port for charging and PC synchronisation. The Bluetooth connectivity lets you to exchange important data from other devices. Other features like BlackBerry maps, Document viewer and Predictive text input are also available in the phone.

Along with this, the game enthusiasts can also play and download games of their choice. The handset provides messaging features like MMS, Instant Messaging and SMS threaded view. A-GPS helps you in navigating to the desired location. Blackberry Curve 8350 also offers Group Connect, permitting it to set-up group conversations among your friends.

productAttributes.title: Samsung Galaxy Pop S5570 Grey
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung Galaxy Pop is a full touch phone, ideal for those who have just joined the party of touchscreen handsets. The Samsung S5570 is powered by a 600 MHz ARM6 processor and runs on Android 2.2 Froyo operating system. The mobile promises productivity and performance at great value for money.

The Galaxy Pop S5570 features a 3.14-inch screen with 240 x 320 pixel resolution. The candy bar shaped phone works both in 2G and 3G networks. The Samsung device is preloaded with social networking apps like Facebook, Orkut and Twitter, ensuring you are always connected to your friends, no matter wherever you are.

There is a 3 megapixel camera loaded in the Galaxy Pop that lets you click pictures and share them immediately with your friends. The camera comes with 3x digital zooming and video recording capabilities. You can shoot videos with resolution of 320 x 240 at 15 fps.

Design

The Samsung Galaxy Pop has a compact design with striking color band around the sides, top and bottom, that lend the phone a sophisticated look. The phone weighs 106.6 g and measures 60.6 x 110.4 x 12.1 mm. The handset has a TFT screen with support for 256 K colors. The S5570 comes with an accelerometer for auto rotation and proximity sensor for auto turn-off.

Storage and Battery

The Samsung S5570 comes with 164 MB memory onboard. You can expand the phone memory externally by using a microSD card for up to 32 GB. A standard Li-Ion 1200 mAh battery is used in the phone that gives a talk time of 9 hours in 2G and 6 hours in 3G network. The phone book and SMS memory will depend on how much memory is loaded through the microSD card.

Connectivity and Features

The mobile phone uses Android browser to surf the Internet, to which you can connect through GPRS, EDGE, 3G and Wi-Fi. Connectivity options in the Galaxy Pop include Bluetooth, microUSB and a 3.5 mm audio jack. The Document Viewer and Editor let you view/edit your documents on your phone via Quickoffice. The Samsung device is integrated with A-GPS to ensure you go in the right direction. Additionally, the Samsung Galaxy Pop has access to several apps on the Android Market.

productAttributes.title: Nokia C2-01 Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nokia C2-01 is an evolved C1-01 and packs a 3.2 megapixel camera, 3G connectivity and Social network connectivity. This budget 3G phone sports a 2 inch display and features a customisable home screen with multiple widget support.

The 3.2 megapixel full focus camera supports up to 4x digital zoom and can record videos in QVGA resolution at 15 fps. The C2-01 comes with post-capture tools like color tone effects, image rotation and direct upload to Flickr. The Nokia 3G phone has dimensions of 46.9 x 109.8 x 15.3 mm and weighs 89 g, rendering it extremely portable and palm-friendly.

Battery and Storage

The C2-01 is powered by a Li-Ion 1020 battery and gives a talk time of 8 hrs on 2G and 4 hours on 3G networks. The mobile comes with 43 MB of onboard memory which can be expanded up to 16 GB via microSD cards.

Multimedia

The C2-01 supports MP3, WAV, eAAC+ audio formats and can play MP4, 3GP, H.264 and H.263 video files. The phone gives you access to the Ovi Store where you can download apps and games. The Nokia C2-01 also comes preloaded with a Facebook application that allows you to receive/update status messages on-the-go. This 3G mobile supports Java apps and supports video streaming via YouTube.

Connectivity and Features

The Nokia C2-01 features an advanced contact database with support for email entry and multiple phone number. This Nokia phone is preloaded with Opera mini Browser and supports 3G, GPRS and EDGE connectivity. Other connectivity options in the handset include Bluetooth v2.1 with EDR, micro USB port and 3.5mm AV connector. Additionally, the phone packs a useful set of utility apps like To-do list, Notes, Calendar and Voice Recorder.

productAttributes.title: Samsung Galaxy S 2 I9100 Noble Black
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung Galaxy S2 I9100 is the much anticipated successor to the hugely successful Galaxy S I9000. The S2 runs Android 2.3 Gingerbread OS which brings in quite a few useful upgrades over the Froyo, including an improved copy/paste function, revamped App Manger and more spaced-out keyboard. Samsung has overlayed the stock Android interface with its TouchWiz 4.0 UI that brings in 3 new hubs and a few aesthetic enhancements.

The 4.27-inch Super AMOLED Plus display on the Galaxy S2 I9100 packs 50% extra subpixels compared to the standard Super AMOLED display on the Galaxy I9000. This translates to brilliant color rendering, enhanced contrast ratios, improved sunlight legibility and smoother video playback.

The Galaxy S2 is powered by a 1.2 GHz ARM Cortex A-9 Dual core processor that renders the phone extremely quick and one of the fastest in the smartphone realm. The faster core speeds allows the I9100 to deliver high-speed multitasking, faster web page loading, and a slicker UI experience. The enhanced encoding/decoding ability of the phone supports smoother full HD 1080p video playback and enhanced HD gaming.

The 8 megapixel camera on the Galaxy I9100 supports full HD video recording at 1080p resolution and is flanked by an LED flash. There is also a front facing 2 megapixel camera for video calls. Samsung has thrown in plenty of manual controls like ISO adjust, choice of three metering and multiple white balance options. Other camera features include Smile Detect, Panorama, Face Detect and a Macro Mode.

Design

The Samsung Galaxy I9100 sports an ultra-thin 8.4 mm chassis with smooth curved edges. The S2 features a unique Hyperskin mesh back panel which gives added grip and prevents the phone from heating up during extended calls.

The WVGA display on the Galaxy I9100 packs 480 x 800 pixels and supports 16 million colors. Apart from the usual triad of accelerometer, proximity and light sensors, the Galaxy S2 I9100 features magnetic and gyroscope sensors that detect dynamic hand and arm movement to deliver an enhanced gaming experience.

Battery and Storage

Despite its slim form factor, Samsung has managed to cram an impressive 1650 mAh battery into the Galaxy S2. The Lithium Ion battery can go unplugged for up to 18 hrs minutes on 2G and up to 8 hrs on 3G networks. The Galaxy S2 I9100 comes with 16 GB of internal memory and supports up to 32 GB microSD cards.

Connectivity and Features

The S2 19100 supports 3G, GPRS , EDGE and Wi-Fi connectivity. The mobile supports DLNA and high speed Bluetooth v 3.0 connectivity for media sharing and comes with a micro USB port for sync and recharge. The Galaxy S2 features an intuitive Voice Command feature that allows hands-free execution of all major functions like calls, texting, launching apps and music control with the ease of a voice command.

The S2 is preloaded with the Readers Hub app which gains you access to over 2 million book titles and 2,500 magazines in 16 different languages. The Social Hub integrates various social networks like Facebook, Orkut and Twitter into a single feed. The Galaxy I9100 can organize and synchronise contacts from multiple networks into a single streamlined phone book.

The Galaxy S2 is optimised for secure access to enterprise resources on a Microsoft Exchange server. This allows you to stay up to date with your business email, calendar, contacts and task synchronisation.

productAttributes.title: Samsung Galaxy Ace S5830 Onyx Black, with 2 GB Micro SD Card
productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung Galaxy Ace is an Android v2.3 Gingerbread smartphone featuring a 3.5 inch capactive touchscreen. The Ace S5830 is powered by a 800 MHz ARM11 processor, with an additional Adreno 200 GPU for handling graphic intensive apps.

The Samsung Galaxy Ace sports a 5 MP camera with LED Flash and a 2x Digital Zoom capable lens.

Design

The Ace S5830 sports a minimalist design featuring clean square trims with smooth rounded edges. The Samsung Galaxy S5830 comes with a 3.5 inches TFT HVGA LCD screen that renders vivid color & contrast ratios even in bright sunlight.

The Galaxy Ace S5830 features an accelerometer for UI auto-rotate and a proximity sensor for auto-turn off. The physical buttons on the Galaxy Ace smartphone include the volume rockers, power button and the touch sensitive Android buttons.

Storage & Battery

The Samsung 3G phone is powered by a 1350 mAh battery that lasts for 11 hrs on 2G and 6.5 hrs on 3G networks. The Galaxy Ace comes with 158 MB of internal memory which can be expanded up to 32 GB via microSD card.

Connectivity & Features

The Samsung Ace S5830 supports 3G HSDPA connectivity at 7.2 mbps, WiFi, USB and Kies PC Sync data transfer options. This Android phone lets you stay connected via multiple mobile social networking platforms including Facebook, Twitter, Gtalk and Myspace. This Samsung 3G phone is preloaded with business suite tools like Thinkfree Document viewer, Voice memo and voice mail.

This 3G phone is preloaded with Android Web Browser and offers pinch-to-zoom support. Other features on the Galaxy Ace include multi format Music player with DNSe sound enhancement and 3.5 mm jack, multi-format video player, and access to over 100,000 apps on the Android Market. The Samsung Android phone supports A-GPS navigation, Digital Compass and location based services with access to Google applications like Google Maps. Samsung's TouchWiz UI retains much of the stock Android features albeit with few welcome tinkering to the menu navigation and social networking access.

The Galaxy Ace S5830 offers one swype access to social networking streams including Facebook, Myspace & Twitter. The phone even integrates your social networking buddies into your phonebook and calendar giving you real time social streams.
